CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(I_RS_Agreement_Title__r.I_RS_Project_Proposal__r.I_RS_Account_Organisation__r.ShippingStreet)), I_RS_Agreement_Title__r.I_RS_Project_Proposal__r.I_RS_Account_Organisation__r.ShippingStreet & BR(), "") &
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(I_RS_Agreement_Title__r.I_RS_Project_Proposal__r.I_RS_Account_Organisation__r.ShippingCity )), I_RS_Agreement_Title__r.I_RS_Project_Proposal__r.I_RS_Account_Organisation__r.ShippingCity & " ", "") &
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(I_RS_Agreement_Title__r.I_RS_Project_Proposal__r.I_RS_Account_Organisation__r.ShippingState)), I_RS_Agreement_Title__r.I_RS_Project_Proposal__r.I_RS_Account_Organisation__r.ShippingState & BR(), "") &
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(I_RS_Agreement_Title__r.I_RS_Project_Proposal__r.I_RS_Account_Organisation__r.ShippingPostalCode)), I_RS_Agreement_Title__r.I_RS_Project_Proposal__r.I_RS_Account_Organisation__r.ShippingPostalCode & BR(), "") &
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(I_RS_Agreement_Title__r.I_RS_Project_Proposal__r.I_RS_Account_Organisation__r.ShippingCountry)), I_RS_Agreement_Title__r.I_RS_Project_Proposal__r.I_RS_Account_Organisation__r.ShippingCountry, "")
CustomField.label: Address For Notices
